# Forecast Products, Interpretation, and Discussion

Here are a vareity of resources ranging from polished, professional forecast products to blogs and forecast discussions. 

### NAV Canada GFA
>> [GFA](https://plan.navcanada.ca/gfa/)
>Short range aviation forecast for Canada. Gives high resolution insight to frontal, precipitation, and cloud motion. Cannot take a nationwide look, only each GFA sector. 

### FOCN45
>> [prairiewx](https://prairiewx.ca/conv_otlk/)
>The website I have listed here for access also provides the ECCC thunderstorm outlook in the same place (thanks to Ryan). The FOCN45 gives a broad overview of significant weather in western Canada over the coming few days.
